item.title: CVE-2022-24942|2024-08-03T04:29:01.529Z -- silabs.com -- gecko%20platform
item.description: Heap based buffer overflow in HTTP Server functionality in Micrium uC-HTTP 3.01.01 allows remote code execution via HTTP request.
